post.body: Has anyone played the demo of Butcher? Looking forward to the full release coming out soon.

Just finished my first play-through of The Cave on my OpenSUSE system. Good fun with some excellent animation and voiceovers.
Not sure I would go for a second play-through with different characters, though...

Have been playing Rogue Stormers and PAC-MAN 256 lately. Rogue Stormers is really smooth and responsive which is something you need in a shooter :-)

Space Grunts is good fun, too. The fire rooms are a nightmare for me though.
Got me a Steam Controller! As with all things Linux, it look a bit of down-and-dirty with the udev files but now I can play my 2D shooters and beat-em-ups the way they should be played.

comment.body: @ZAlex: I couldn't use another distro as I'd miss the Packman repository too much :-)
